籤詩版本二:
Mugwagwa wacho une ngozi, mabhiza nevarume vari kumhanya-mhanya, uye varwi vari munjodzi huru pavanenge varasika.
Mahombekombe akakwirira, mhepo nemafungu zviri kuputsika, igwa rakaputsika, zuva rava kunyura, maruva ari kufa, denga riri kudonha, uye chando chiri kudonha.棹: oar.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram yakafanana nechikepe chiri kuputsa mahombekombe.
Ngwarira njodzi dzose.
解曰: Chikoro chekare uye chekare. Akanyarara uye asina chaanopomerwa. Hapana chikonzero chekutsvaka mazano. Famba wakasununguka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Mambo weChu Yin Ling akarasika
Mukutanga kwegore ra202 BC, mauto eHan anosvika 400 000 kubva kumativi matatu akakomba mauto eXiang Yu muGaixia, akanga asina zvokudya zvakakwana. neuto reHan. Iri zano repfungwa re "kukombwa kumativi ese" rakakonzera mauto eXiang Yu kurasikirwa nehunhu.
Saka Xiang Yu akatungamira vanopfuura mazana masere vatasvi vemabhiza vakasarudza kubuda, uku mauto eHan akatevera zvakanyanya naGuan Ying nevatasvi vemabhiza zviuru zvishanu. Mushure mokuyambuka Rwizi rweHuai, vatasvi vemabhiza vaXiang Yu vakangosara nezana revanhu.
Xiang yu akarasika muYinling ndokubvunza mumwe murimi padivi pemugwagwa nzira inoenda kurwizi, asingafungire akatevedza gwara rakanga ranongedzerwa namudhara ndokunoguma atopinda mudhanga remvura zvekuti kufamba kwakaoma. Bang.
聖意: Mhuri nemba vari kunetsekana nenjodzi dzavo dzega Kutsvaga mari nekuparadza bhizimusi muchato haugari Liujia ine ngozi Vanofamba netsoka varikuvharisa minda .Silkworms 6 zvipfuyo zvaparara Kushaikwa kwevanhu . Kurasikirwa.Kutama.Kurasika.Kurwara.Hazvina kunaka kutumira kuguva regomo.
古人: Mambo Yin Ling weChu akarasika nzira
